noun.description: A Maori religious movement based on Christianity. It was founded by the Maori leader Te Kooti Arikirangi Te Turuki (c.1832–93) in 1867.
examples: we need to cater for spiritual beliefs that include the likes of Ringatu

adjective.description: Relating to the Ringatu religion or church.
examples: a minister of the Ringatu faith

origin: Early 20th century: from Maori ringa hands and tu raised up.
